content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/psf/black.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image from the Docker Hub
FROM python:3.8

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entirety of the repo into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install the testing dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r test_requirements.txt

# Run the test suite to verify the installation
RUN tox -e py
